# AuroraView

> A lightweight WebView framework for DCC (Digital Content Creation) software, built with Rust and Python bindings. Perfect for Maya, 3ds Max, Houdini, Blender, and more.

AuroraView provides a modern web-based UI solution for professional DCC applications like Maya, 3ds Max, Houdini, Blender, Photoshop, and Unreal Engine. Built on Rust's Wry library with PyO3 bindings, it offers native performance with minimal overhead.

- **Package**: `pip install auroraview`
- **Python**: 3.7+
- **Platforms**: Windows, macOS, Linux
- **License**: MIT
- **Repository**: https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview
- **PyPI**: https://pypi.org/project/auroraview/

## Key Features

- **Lightweight**: ~5MB package size vs ~120MB for Electron
- **Fast**: Native Rust performance with minimal memory footprint
- **Native WebView**: Uses system WebView (WebView2/WKWebView/WebKitGTK) for minimal footprint
- **Bidirectional Communication**: Python â†” JavaScript IPC with async/await support
- **Custom Protocol Handler**: Load resources from DCC projects (`auroraview://`, custom protocols)
- **Event System**: Node.js-style EventEmitter with `on()`, `once()`, `off()`, `emit()`
- **Multi-Window Support**: WindowManager for creating/managing multiple windows
- **Thread-Safe**: Rust-guaranteed memory safety and concurrent operations
- **Cross-Platform**: Windows, macOS, and Linux support
- **DCC-First Design**: Built specifically for DCC software integration
- **Type-Safe**: Full type checking with Rust + Python

## Technical Stack

- Core: Rust 1.75+, PyO3 0.22 (abi3), Wry 0.47, Tao 0.30
- Web engines: Windows (WebView2), macOS (WKWebView), Linux (WebKitGTK)
- Packaging: maturin with abi3 â†’ one wheel works for CPython 3.7-3.13

## Integration Modes

| Mode | Class | Best For | Docking Support |
|------|-------|----------|-----------------|
| **Qt Native** | `QtWebView` | Maya, Houdini, Nuke, 3ds Max | âœ… QDockWidget |
| **HWND** | `AuroraView` | Unreal Engine, non-Qt apps | âœ… via HWND API |
| **Standalone** | `run_standalone` | Desktop applications | N/A |

## Quick Start

### Installation

```bash
# Windows/macOS
pip install auroraview

# With Qt support (for Maya, Houdini, Nuke)
pip install auroraview[qt]
```

### Basic Usage

```python
from auroraview import WebView

# Create and show WebView
webview = WebView.create("My App", url="http://localhost:3000")
webview.show()
```

### Desktop App (one-liner)

```python
from auroraview import run_desktop

run_desktop(title="My App", url="http://localhost:3000")
```

### Maya Integration (Qt-based)

```python
from auroraview import QtWebView
import maya.OpenMayaUI as omui

webview = QtWebView(
    parent=maya_main_window(),
    url="http://localhost:3000",
    width=800,
    height=600
)
webview.show()
```

### Unreal Engine (HWND-based)

```python
from auroraview import AuroraView

webview = AuroraView(url="http://localhost:3000")
webview.show()

hwnd = webview.get_hwnd()
if hwnd:
    import unreal
    unreal.parent_external_window_to_slate(hwnd)
```

## Core API

### WebView Class

```python
WebView(
    title: str = "AuroraView",
    width: int = 800,
    height: int = 600,
    url: str = None,
    html: str = None,
    debug: bool = True,
    context_menu: bool = True,
    resizable: bool = True,
    frame: bool = True,
    parent: int = None,
    mode: str = None,
    asset_root: str = None,
    allow_file_protocol: bool = False,
    always_on_top: bool = False,
    transparent: bool = False,
)
```

### Content Loading

```python
webview.load_url("http://localhost:3000")
webview.load_html("<h1>Hello World</h1>")
webview.load_file("path/to/index.html")
```

### JavaScript Execution

```python
webview.eval_js("console.log('Hello from Python')")
webview.eval_js_async(
    "document.title",
    callback=lambda result: print(f"Title: {result}"),
    timeout_ms=5000
)
```

### Window Control

```python
webview.show()
webview.hide()
webview.close()
webview.resize(1024, 768)
webview.move(100, 100)
webview.minimize()
webview.maximize()
webview.toggle_fullscreen()
webview.focus()
```

## Bidirectional Communication

### Python â†’ JavaScript

```python
webview.emit("update_data", {"frame": 120, "objects": ["cube", "sphere"]})
```

```javascript
window.auroraview.on('update_data', (data) => {
    console.log('Frame:', data.frame);
});
```

### JavaScript â†’ Python (Events)

```javascript
window.auroraview.send_event('export_scene', {
    path: '/path/to/export.fbx',
    format: 'fbx'
});
```

```python
@webview.on("export_scene")
def handle_export(data):
    print(f"Exporting to: {data['path']}")
```

### JavaScript â†’ Python (RPC with Return Value)

```javascript
const result = await auroraview.api.get_hierarchy({ root: 'scene' });
console.log(result);
```

```python
@webview.bind_call("api.get_hierarchy")
def get_hierarchy(root=None):
    return {"children": ["group1", "mesh_cube"], "count": 2}
```

## API Binding

```python
# Bind single method
@webview.bind_call("api.echo")
def echo(message: str = "") -> dict:
    return {"message": message}

# Bind all methods of an object
class API:
    def get_data(self) -> dict:
        return {"items": [1, 2, 3]}

    def save_item(self, name: str = "", value: int = 0) -> dict:
        return {"ok": True, "name": name}

webview.bind_api(API(), namespace="api")
```

## Custom Protocol Handler

```python
webview = WebView(
    title="My App",
    asset_root="./assets"
)

def handle_maya_protocol(uri: str) -> dict:
    path = uri.replace("maya://", "")
    try:
        with open(f"C:/maya_projects/{path}", "rb") as f:
            return {
                "data": f.read(),
                "mime_type": "image/png",
                "status": 200
            }
    except FileNotFoundError:
        return {"data": b"Not Found", "mime_type": "text/plain", "status": 404}

webview.register_protocol("maya", handle_maya_protocol)
```

## Window Events

```python
@webview.on_shown
def on_shown(data):
    print("Window is now visible")

@webview.on_focused
def on_focused(data):
    print("Window gained focus")

@webview.on_resized
def on_resized(data):
    print(f"Window resized to {data.width}x{data.height}")

@webview.on_closing
def on_closing(data):
    return True  # Return True to allow close, False to cancel
```

## File Drop Events

```python
from auroraview.core.events import WindowEvent

@webview.on(WindowEvent.FILE_DROP)
def on_file_drop(data):
    for path in data['paths']:
        print(f"Dropped: {path}")
    print(f"Position: {data['position']['x']}, {data['position']['y']}")

@webview.on(WindowEvent.FILE_DROP_HOVER)
def on_file_hover(data):
    if data['hovering']:
        print(f"Dragging {len(data['paths'])} files over window")
```

## Signals (Qt-like Pattern)

```python
from auroraview import WebView, Signal

class MyTool(WebView):
    selection_changed = Signal(list)
    progress_updated = Signal(int, str)

    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__(title="My Tool")
        self.selection_changed.connect(self._on_selection)

    def _on_selection(self, items):
        print(f"Selection: {items}")

    def update_selection(self, items):
        self.selection_changed.emit(items)
```

## Desktop Application APIs (JavaScript)

### File Dialogs

```javascript
const result = await auroraview.dialog.openFile({
    title: 'Select a File',
    defaultPath: '/home/user',
    filters: [
        { name: 'Images', extensions: ['png', 'jpg', 'gif'] },
        { name: 'All Files', extensions: ['*'] }
    ]
});

const files = await auroraview.dialog.openFiles({ title: 'Select Files' });
const folder = await auroraview.dialog.openFolder({ title: 'Select Folder' });
const savePath = await auroraview.dialog.saveFile({
    title: 'Save As',
    defaultName: 'document.txt',
    filters: [{ name: 'Text', extensions: ['txt'] }]
});

await auroraview.dialog.info('Operation completed!', 'Success');
await auroraview.dialog.warning('This action cannot be undone.', 'Warning');
await auroraview.dialog.error('File not found.', 'Error');
const confirmed = await auroraview.dialog.ask('Save changes?', 'Confirm');
```

### File System Operations

```javascript
const content = await auroraview.fs.readFile('/path/to/file.txt');
const base64 = await auroraview.fs.readFileBinary('/path/to/image.png');
const buffer = await auroraview.fs.readFileBuffer('/path/to/file.bin');

await auroraview.fs.writeFile('/path/to/file.txt', 'Hello World');
await auroraview.fs.writeFileBinary('/path/to/file.bin', uint8Array);

const exists = await auroraview.fs.exists('/path/to/file.txt');
const stat = await auroraview.fs.stat('/path/to/file.txt');
const entries = await auroraview.fs.readDir('/path/to/dir');

await auroraview.fs.createDir('/path/to/new/dir');
await auroraview.fs.remove('/path/to/file.txt');
await auroraview.fs.copy('/source/file.txt', '/dest/file.txt');
await auroraview.fs.rename('/old/path.txt', '/new/path.txt');
```

### Shell Commands

```javascript
const result = await auroraview.shell.execute('python', ['-c', 'print("Hello")']);
const { pid } = await auroraview.shell.spawn('notepad', ['file.txt']);
const pythonPath = await auroraview.shell.which('python');
const home = await auroraview.shell.getEnv('HOME');
const env = await auroraview.shell.getEnvAll();

await auroraview.shell.open('https://github.com');
await auroraview.shell.openPath('/path/to/document.pdf');
await auroraview.shell.showInFolder('/path/to/file.txt');
```

## Qt Integration (QtWebView)

```python
from auroraview import QtWebView
from qtpy.QtWidgets import QDialog, QVBoxLayout

dialog = QDialog(maya_main_window())
layout = QVBoxLayout(dialog)

webview = QtWebView(parent=dialog, width=800, height=600)
layout.addWidget(webview)

webview.load_url("http://localhost:3000")

dialog.show()
webview.show()
```

### WebView2 Pre-warming

```python
from auroraview.integration.qt import WebViewPool

WebViewPool.prewarm()

if WebViewPool.has_prewarmed():
    print(f"Pre-warm took {WebViewPool.get_prewarm_time():.2f}s")
```

## System Tray Support

```python
from auroraview import run_desktop

run_desktop(
    title="Background App",
    html=my_html,
    width=400,
    height=300,
    system_tray=True,
    hide_on_close=True,
)
```

## Floating Tool Windows

```python
from auroraview import WebView

webview = WebView.create(
    title="AI Assistant",
    html=panel_html,
    width=320,
    height=400,
    frame=False,
    transparent=True,
    always_on_top=True,
    tool_window=True,
    parent=parent_hwnd,
    mode="owner",
)
webview.show()
```

## Application Packaging

```bash
# Pack a URL-based application
auroraview-cli pack --url https://example.com --output myapp

# Pack a frontend project
auroraview-cli pack --frontend ./dist --output myapp

# Pack with configuration
auroraview-cli pack --config auroraview.pack.toml
```

Configuration example (`auroraview.pack.toml`):

```toml
[package]
name = "my-app"
version = "1.0.0"

[app]
title = "My Application"
frontend_path = "./dist"

[window]
width = 1200
height = 800
resizable = true

[bundle]
icon = "./assets/my-app-icon.png"

[bundle.platform.windows]
console = false

[python]
entry_point = "main:main"
include_paths = ["./backend"]
strategy = "standalone"
```

## Command Line Interface

```bash
auroraview --url https://example.com
auroraview --html /path/to/file.html
auroraview --url https://example.com --title "My App" --width 1024 --height 768
uvx auroraview --url https://example.com
```

## Testing Framework

### HeadlessWebView

```python
from auroraview.testing import HeadlessWebView

with HeadlessWebView.auto() as webview:
    webview.goto("https://example.com")
    webview.click("#button")
    assert webview.text("#result") == "Success"

with HeadlessWebView.playwright() as webview:
    webview.load_html("<h1>Test</h1>")
    assert webview.text("h1") == "Test"
    webview.screenshot("test.png")
```

### Available Backends

| Backend | Method | Platform | Use Case |
|---------|--------|----------|----------|
| Playwright | `HeadlessWebView.playwright()` | All | CI/CD |
| Xvfb | `HeadlessWebView.virtual_display()` | Linux | Real WebView |
| WebView2 CDP | `HeadlessWebView.webview2_cdp(url)` | Windows | Real WebView2 |

## JavaScript API Reference

### window.auroraview

```javascript
// Call Python method (returns Promise)
const result = await auroraview.call('api.method_name', { param: value });

// Call via api proxy (shorthand)
const result = await auroraview.api.method_name({ param: value });

// Invoke plugin command (returns Promise)
const content = await auroraview.invoke('plugin:fs|read_file', { path: '/path/to/file.txt' });

// Send event to Python (fire-and-forget)
auroraview.send_event('event_name', { data: value });

// Listen for Python events
const unsubscribe = auroraview.on('event_name', (data) => {
    console.log('Received:', data);
});

// Unsubscribe
auroraview.off('event_name', handler);

// Local JS event (does NOT reach Python)
auroraview.trigger('local_event', data);
```

### Event Utilities

```javascript
const debouncedResize = auroraview.utils.debounce(function() {
    console.log('Resized!');
}, 250);
window.addEventListener('resize', debouncedResize);

const throttledScroll = auroraview.utils.throttle(function() {
    console.log('Scrolled!');
}, 100);
window.addEventListener('scroll', throttledScroll);

auroraview.onDebounced('resize', handler, 250);
auroraview.onThrottled('scroll', handler, 100);
```

### Ready Event

```javascript
window.addEventListener('auroraviewready', () => {
    auroraview.api.init();
});
```

## DCC Software Support

| Software | Status | Python | Mode |
|----------|--------|--------|------|
| Maya | âœ… | 3.7+ | Qt Native (QtWebView) |
| 3ds Max | âœ… | 3.7+ | Qt Native (QtWebView) |
| Houdini | âœ… | 3.7+ | Qt Native (QtWebView) |
| Blender | âœ… | 3.7+ | Standalone mode |
| Nuke | âœ… | 3.7+ | Qt Native (QtWebView) |
| Unreal Engine | âœ… | 3.7+ | HWND mode (AuroraView) |
| Photoshop | ðŸš§ | 3.7+ | Planned |

## Plugin System

- **Process Plugin**: Run external processes with stdout/stderr streaming
- **File System Plugin**: Native file operations (read, write, copy, move)
- **Dialog Plugin**: Native file/folder dialogs and message boxes
- **Shell Plugin**: Execute commands, open URLs, reveal in file manager
- **Clipboard Plugin**: System clipboard read/write access

## Chrome Extension API Compatibility

- Storage API: `chrome.storage.local/sync/session`
- Bookmarks API: Create, search, update, delete bookmarks
- History API: Search and manage browsing history
- Downloads API: Download files with progress tracking
- Cookies API: Get, set, remove cookies
- Notifications API: System notifications with actions
- TTS API: Text-to-speech synthesis
- Idle/Power API: User activity detection and power management

## Key Imports

```python
from auroraview import (
    WebView,
    Signal,
    AuroraView,
    QtWebView,
    run_standalone,
    EventTimer,
    path_to_file_url,
)
```

- [WebView API](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/docs/api/webview.md): Core WebView class reference
- [AuroraView API](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/docs/api/auroraview.md): HWND-based wrapper
- [QtWebView API](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/docs/api/qt-webview.md): Qt widget integration
- [Browser API](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/docs/api/browser.md): Browser-related APIs

- [Thread Safety Diagnosis](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/docs/architecture/thread-safety-diagnosis.md): Thread safety analysis

### RFCs (Request for Comments)

- [RFC 0001: AuroraView MCP Server](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/docs/rfcs/0001-auroraview-mcp-server.md)
- [RFC 0002: DCC Thread Safety](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/docs/rfcs/0002-dcc-thread-safety.md)
- [RFC 0003: VX Packed Dependency Bootstrap](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/docs/rfcs/0003-vx-packed-dependency-bootstrap.md)
- [RFC 0004: Multi-Window Management](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/docs/rfcs/0004-multi-window-management.md)
- [RFC 0005: DCC Plugin Architecture](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/docs/rfcs/0005-dcc-plugin-architecture.md)
- [RFC 0006: AuroraView Browser Crate](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/docs/rfcs/0006-auroraview-browser-crate.md)
- [RFC 0007: WebView Browser Unified Architecture](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/docs/rfcs/0007-webview-browser-unified-architecture.md)
- [RFC 0008: AI Agent Integration](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/docs/rfcs/0008-ai-agent-integration.md)
- [RFC 0009: AI Chat UI Integration](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/docs/rfcs/0009-ai-chat-ui-integration.md)
- [RFC 0010: Event Loop Optimization](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/docs/rfcs/0010-event-loop-optimization.md)
- [RFC 0011: Unified IPC Architecture](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/docs/rfcs/0011-unified-ipc-architecture.md)

## Examples

- [Simple Decorator](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/examples/simple_decorator.py): Basic decorator pattern
- [Dynamic Binding](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/examples/dynamic_binding.py): Dynamic API binding
- [Desktop App Demo](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/examples/desktop_app_demo.py): Desktop application example
- [Qt Browser](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/examples/qt_browser.py): Qt-based browser
- [Multi Window Demo](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/examples/multi_window_demo.py): Multi-window management
- [Floating Panel Demo](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/examples/floating_panel_demo.py): Floating panel window
- [System Tray Demo](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/examples/system_tray_demo.py): System tray integration
- [Window Effects Demo](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/examples/window_effects_demo.py): Window visual effects
- [AI Chat Demo](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/examples/ai_chat_demo.py): AI chat integration
- [AI CDP Integration](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/examples/ai_cdp_integration.py): AI + CDP integration
- [Cookie Management Demo](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/examples/cookie_management_demo.py): Cookie management
- [DOM Manipulation Demo](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/examples/dom_manipulation_demo.py): DOM manipulation
- [Custom Context Menu Demo](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/examples/custom_context_menu_demo.py): Custom context menus
- [Local Assets Example](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/examples/local_assets_example.py): Local asset loading
- [DCC Integration Example](https://github.com/loonghao/auroraview/blob/main/examples/dcc_integration_example.py): DCC integration
